history.text: Hello
Despicable Me has a high Rotten Tomato score, which means that is well-liked by peers.
Despicable Me also stars a villain instead of a hero.
What do you think about it being fresh and smart for adults?
I am not sure I would see it, if I did not have kids.
I think it is a more appealing movie for adults with children. I would want to see this movie, over others,
That's interesting, because it has a lot of critical responses for adults.
Overall, most of the critic cites gave the movie pretty high ratings.
How do you think the soundtrack for the Movie would be since Pharrell sings the song "Despicable Me" which Gru names himself.
Have you seen other movies created by Illumination Entertainment?
I do. Pharrell is great at creating songs for movies that can transcend the screen.
I am not sure. I am not very familiar with Illumination Entertainment I guess they are not branded as well as Disney. Have you seen any of their movies?
Do you think that cast or voice actors are a motivator for seeing the movie?
I don't know... because they aren't well branded.
Absolutely! I would want to see a movie voicing Jason Segel.
Why do you think that Gru wants to steal the moon?
Do you usually watch movies that are rated higher by critics or do you not pay attention to reviews?
I don't normally pay attention to reviews for movies; unless there are historical references to the movie
I don't pay attention to reviews, either.  Do you tend to watch this genre of movie?
Using a shrink ray for collateral is a very interesting concept in the movie
Yes, I'm a kid at heart...
Children's movie's that have adult undertones are the BEST!
I do agree. I like that the Gru is a villian, but has a soft spot for the girls.
It's adorable!
I like the conflict between work and family.
The twist of Vector being Perkins' son is ironic
seeing as though Perkins' wants the Shrink Ray stolen.
It does however, make me wonder what lesson is Perkins attempting to teach Vector.
I enjoy how the bank is called the Bank of Evil and the bank president is also evil.
How does Vector profit from stealing the girls.
I think that part of the movie is predictable.
I concur. The concept of an Evil bank and Evil bank President is hilarious.
It actually is...
But who would want to be stuck with someone else's kids!
Do you think Dr. Nefario is a good friend to Gru?
That is why the movie was predictable. However, be that as it may, I would still probably see it with my kids.
I don't know if there was enough character development with his character.
Right!
he's just mentioned randomly!
Makes me randomly think: "What does Gru get out of stealing the moon (besides credit)?"
Yes, or what is the point? Yes, it is the moon. At the same time, it is the moon. We know the function it facilitate?

uid2response.feedback: I have seen the movie before. So, it was hard limiting the chat to info on the document provided. I think it went well.
